name: xmtoolbox-sync
description: ## Environment Config 1. Create a file called .env in the root of the project directory 2. Place the following within that file     a. `PROD_SUBDOMAIN=<xMatters-Subdomain>`     b. `PROD_USERNAME=<xMatters-REST-User>`     c. `PROD_PASSWORD=<REST-User-Password>` 3. The npm package `dotenv` reads this file at runtime and creates Node runtime environment variables to be accessed.
author: Hayden Miedema
